code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./NavBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NavBar(){const[click,setClick]=useState(false);const[button,setButton]=useState(true);const handleClick=()=>setClick(!click);const closeMobileMenu=()=>setClick(false);const showButton=()=>{if(window.innerWidth<=960){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);}};window.addEventListener('resize',showButton);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"Navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{classname:"profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Freddy Lopez"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:click?'nav-menu active':'nav-menu',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/projects",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Projects"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/gallery",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Gallery"})})]})]})})});}/*studioBinder*/export default NavBar;
